name: Olympic Lifting Basics
description: Fundamentals of Olympic weightlifting for explosive power and athletic performance.

cards.title: Snatch Technique & Progressions
cards.description: Mastering the snatch movement for maximum power output.
bulletpoints: Focus on triple extension for explosive movement
Develop mobility in shoulders and hips for better lift mechanics
Break down the snatch into pull, turnover, and receiving positions

cards.title: Clean & Jerk Fundamentals
cards.description: Building strength and coordination through proper clean and jerk technique.
bulletpoints: Improve front squat positioning for a stronger clean
Develop upper-body power for an efficient jerk phase
Refine bar path and grip to enhance lifting efficiency
